archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0412
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS solution, I must be able to take a feed from external Vodafone systems that may dictate a staff users accesses and rights. For example, a HR system may trigger a removal of a staff members access when employment is terminated.

properties.value: For horizon 1 this means integration with Vodafone AD (for Horizon 2 this would be also needed for Customers). To be discussed during architecture meeting, integration details to be checked.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
